Description:
Detect changes to the "PendingFileRenameOperations" registry key from uncommon or suspicious images locations to stage currently used files for rename or deletion after reboot.


Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potential PendingFileRenameOperations Tampering
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where ((event_type = 'setvalue' and target_object like '%\currentcontrolset\control\session manager\pendingfilerenameoperations%') and ((process_path like '%\reg.exe' or process_path like '%\regedit.exe') or (process_path like '%\appdata\local\temp\%' or process_path like '%\users\public\%')))
